attributes.action: Give children more freedom in schools and stop making things harder
attributes.additional_details: Too much required in a school day, very hard examinations, give children some more freedom and let them enjoy their lives.
attributes.background: Students in secondary schools are required to be under new guidelines all the time, and it just make things harder for people and brings on a lot of stress. Schools are becoming too strict and difficult due to new laws and guidelines, which is getting out of hand.

rejection.details: It is not clear what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what you would like to change.
